name: There'll Be Gold
description:
There'll Be Gold is a short horror  walking simulator.

Take on a role of a prospector and travel into a distant wild land where the rivers shimmer like gold.

Listen to the stories your colleague has to tell and discover what happened years ago, on his first visit to this place, and who lies in the old abandoned grave in the middle of nowhere.

This is my first solo finished project. I've learned a lot, I've failed a lot, but I hope you enjoy.
